@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mixin for all widgets that can have other widgets as children, this mixin includes the static parsing part and the methods for the widget instance.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the HTML code for the children if this widget

@param.name: @param
@param.body: noWidgetContainer {Boolean} if false: do not surround the childrens with a div-element with class 'widget_container'
@param.description: if false: do not surround the childrens with a div-element with class 'widget_container'

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property children. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #children}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property children. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #children}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property children. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #children}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property childWidgets. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childWidgets}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property childWidgets. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childWidgets}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property childWidgets. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childWidgets}.
